title: kick
description: Kicks a player from the server.

fields.title: name
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: reason
fields.description: A `message` in plain text that explains why player was kicked. Default: `Kicked by an operator`.
